comment: Prof. Farrington is the sweetest lady ever! There are only a few grades which are tests&lots of homework which is not graded. As long as you do the homework &ask questions you WILL get a good grade. Dont be scared by these fake news reviews, they probably wanted the grade handed to them! Stuck on a test? Ask for help & she will give you the answer
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: I was a little frustrated in this class because she does not allow calculators, and I had a lot of trouble paying attention in class. She is a very sweet lady and will help you outside of class, but if you won't have time to attend her office hours then I would maybe find another teacher.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--TEST HEAVY

comment: Prof. Farrington is probably the sweetest lady ever. If you do your homework and study, you WILL get a good grade in this class. She is very knowledgeable and she will always help you no matter what. She is very passionate about what she teaches. IF YOUR CONFUSED WHILE TAKING A TEST, ASK HER FOR HELP. SHE WILL WALK YOU THROUGH YOUR PROBLEM.
No calculators allowed. Do not take this class unless you are a god at mental math. Very sweet lady though.

No online codes needed. Very kind and inviting to ask questions. Attendance is not mandatory but her lectures are VERY necessary to pass. She is overall a great professor. She grades on a 20 point scale for each test which helps students not fail the tests/pass the course. 6 tests which she totals and divides by 6. Highly recommend.

There are about 50 questions of homework for each class. The only thing you are graded on is tests. She does not collect homework or give quizzes. Don't skip on homework or studying or you will fall behind. She goes through every step of every problem in class so don't skip.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: She's a tough grader, but she is really helpful & nice inside and outside of class. Go to office hours if you have the opportunity to because it really makes a difference in your grade. Attendance is not mandatory, but I wouldn't miss class because you'll most likely will miss a lot. You can't use a calculator, but the work doesn't require one.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS
